name: Gather solar panels for Balthazar
description: Balthazar needs some solar panels to stabilize the power to their bunker.

dialogue.describe: The power in my bunker is failing and I need 12 solar panels to stabilize them.
dialogue.advice: Most commercial buildings have some solare panels or, if we're lucky, you might find a solar farm.
dialogue.inquire: Power is holding for now but I need those panels soon.
